Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Lake
ShortDescription: 57  buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Central, Washington, and Laramie due to street blockage near Laramie/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Chicago, Central, Washington, and Laramie due to street blockage near Laramie/Lake.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Muskegon
ShortDescription: Northbound 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, and Ewing due to, street blockage near 106th/Muskegon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, and Ewing due to, street blockage near 106th/Muskegon.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
